document.description: Play the role of chef Mary who is running a faimous fast food restaurant. Mary have a lot of ... red hot, all beef, chicken with a generous helping of vegetables, condiments ...
document.body:
Home Baking Games Burger Games Cake Games Cooking Games Decoration Games Pizza Games Restaurant Games Serving Games Here you can find best games listed by tag: fast food games Big Tasty Hamburger
A yummy hamburger is always a good solution when you are stressed and very busy. For example when you have some exams or anything else that may keep you away from the kitchen. It's exactly this girls' problem and she needs a fast and nourishing meal. So we decided to give an awesome burger made entirely by you. Have fun decorating the bread roll. Breakfast
Being the most important meal of the day in this game you will learn how to make a great break fast food for you and your family. Good luck cooking break fast ! Breakfast Bar
In this serving game you will take care of your break fast bar and your clients. To make your business work well take care of your clients and make them feel good in there, don't let them wait too much for the orders and smile all the time. Good luck! Breakfast Cooking
Make the best and the most amazing break fast for you and your family because break fast is the most important meal of the day. Good luck cooking break fast ! Breakfast Sandwich Shop
Make the best sandwich for some hungry and beautiful kids and make sure to serve them with the exact type of sandwich. Good luck Chicken Fastfood
Serve your customers as fast as you can and earn the highest score you just have to be fast and make the best fast food for your clients. Good luck! Cooking a Burger
In a few minutes you will cook a great burger based on a great recipe. Take this opportunity to make a great burger and enjoy this game. Cooking a Hamburger
Learn how to cook a delicious hamburger with tomato, onions, pickles and many other ingredients? You can find the perfect recipe that will make you a delicious hamburger. Cooking a Hamburger
In this burger game you will fin a perfect hamburger recipe. Its easy for you to make this burger in a few steps. Enjoy! Cooking Hamburger
If you want to make the most tasty hamburger play this cooking game, and take the ingredients you like, combine them, and have fun cooking the most delicious hamburgers for you and your friends! Cosmic Breakfast
This is a cooking game where you will make a delicious cosmic break fast for you and your friends. Good luck! Deli Creation Game
The main priority are the clients, serve them the best food and make them come again in to your fast food shop. Good luck! Fast Cooking
Just put the the cheese the eggs and the meat in the bowl and mix them. Make this cooking operation as fast as you can! Fast Food
To win this cooking game play the role of a cute waitress, who will turn her delicious fast food into the most popular restaurant in her town! Picking the right product from the list there and bringing a huge smile on the sweet looking waitress's face you will make a yummy food . Have fun! Fastfood Rapidly
Play the role of chef Mary who is running a faimous fast food restaurant. Mary have a lot of clients in his fast food restaurant. Give your clients a fast food rapidly. Good luck! Fun And Burger
In this game everything is about having fun and burgers. Combine all the ingredients and put them together one at a time to make each hamburger delicious. When you finish the hamburger click on the box. Grill Time
Be a good fast food employee, grill and serve your customers orders quickly and accurately to pass to the next level. Don't forget to add their fave condiments to the food ! Good luck! How To Make Shawarma
Shawarma is a famous fast food and now you can try to make it alone and have a lot of fun doing it. Enjoy! Lea Fast Food Restaurant
You are now the new waitress in this nice restaurant and you will do a hard work here because the clients are coming very fast . There are so many customers coming in, and they all want to get their orders really quickly and to win this game you need to reach the target each day. Good luck! Lisa Food Shop
Lisa is coming into our town today, she is very happy that she managed to open this new food shop in this particular spot. The food she is selling is actually fast food but it is made in a very healthy way with fresh ingredients, salad, meat, eggs and everything you want in your healthy meal. Have tons of fun while preparing the food and sell it to your happy customers. Making Breakfast Game
Be a good cooking chef prepare a delicious break fast to start the day right. Have fun and good luck playing this cooking game! Oyunstar Sandivic Canavari
Catch tasty items to make the best sandwich. If you will catch 3 bad items you will lose the game. Enjoy! Paninilicious Game
Kids are waiting for you to serve them with the best sandwiches. Enjoy and be the best with your kids clients! Papas Pizzeria
Papa Louie is a good manager but now he need your help to run his Papa's Pizzeria while Papa Louie is gone. Serve as many customers and win money and a big score to win this game. Good luck! Picnic Delight
Jonny want to make a great picnic and you will have to help him make the food and organize this picnic. Good luck! Picnic Game
If you want to make a picnic party first you have to make some delicious snacks and of course this will take time and some energy that is why you will have some practice if you will play this game. Good luck with your picnic! Picnic Game
Two lovely kids characters has decided to go to a picnic today and your job in this cute game is to help them to make this picnic. The most important thing of all to chose some yummy snacks and sandwiches. Enjoy! Roadside Fastfood
Your customers that came to your restaurant want the food make preferred by the them and you have to make it and give it to them. If you serve wrongly your score will go down. Good luck! Royal Hot Dog
Make the best royal hot dog. Choose from an assortment of rye, or kaiser buns then drop in a smokey, red hot, all beef or chicken wiener and fix it up. Good luck and have fun! Royal Hot Dog
Select from an assortment of rye, or kaiser buns then drop in a smokey, red hot, all beef, chicken with a generous helping of vegetables, condiments and garnish and make a great Royal Hot Dog! Enjoy cooking hot dogs everyday! Sloppy Joes Burger
Granny will teach us today one of her great recipe and burger recipes too. Come and play this games to learn new recipes every day. Have fun cooking! Staff Of The Month
Now play this game and serve your clients in the best way possible with the best food . Don't make your clients wait for you too much because they will leave very upset. Enjoy! Tasty Burger Cooking
Play this cooking burgers game and learn how to cook the most tasty burger. Choose from each category what you prefer to eat for a small lunch. Enjoy your fast food ! The Feeding
Your customers are the kids and you have to serve them the right food to make points and win the game. Good luck! Turkey Burger
If you want to make the best burgers and to win this cooking game be a good burger chef and make the most perfect turkey burger. Good luck! Victoria Sandwich
In this game you will be a great help for Victoria and you will learn how to make the best sandwich ever. Follow the recipe and instruction and have fun cooking the best sandwich! Enjoy!
(36 results found) Check out these other great sites:
